title: apirone.com
author: apirone.com
content: Apirone.com is a gateway for crypto payments in Bitcoin, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash, and Dogecoin.What our service provides:White label crypto processing using APIInvoicesCMS plugins for OpenCart and WooCommerceDonation widgetWe accept all incoming payments absolutely Free.Payouts and mass payments with fixed fees. https://apirone.com/pricingOpen RESTful APITo get started, you do not need to go through tedious registration, KYC, and DOCs, just connect and get to work. Use the payment interface without any restrictions, both in terms of the amount and the number of payments.Our support team is happy to help you.support@apirone.comhttps://apirone.com

comments.created_time: October 24, 2022, 07:57:48 PMLast edit: October 29, 2022, 09:12:52 PM by decodx
comments.body: There are many other payment methods available for merchants to accept Bitcoin. How does your service differ from other, more popular services, such as BitPay, Coinbase or CoinGate? It all comes down to what each individual merchant is looking for in terms of functionality and pricing. Are there any advantages to using your service over the competition?

comments.author: apirone.com
comments.body: Quote from: decodx on October 24, 2022, 07:57:48 PMThere are many other payment methods available for merchants to accept Bitcoin. How does your service differ from other, more popular services, such as BitPay, Coinbase or CoinGate? It all comes down to what each individual merchant is looking for in terms of functionality and pricing. Are there any advantages to using your service over the competition? 1) Isolated wallet. Your money will not be mixed with others. Also, you transfer coins from the exact address.2) Mass-payments3) Immediately transfer4) no KYC / blocks5) One endpoint for all cryptosAlso, all incoming payments are free of charge for customers and merchants.

comments.author: apirone.com
comments.body: Currently, the Bitcoin mempool has 200k+ unconfirmed transactions, the network fee is too high for most transactions and they are stuck. But don't worry, nobody loses Bitcoins. We permanently re-broadcast all our transactions so the transactions will be confirmed sooner or later.Also, you can choose high fees strategies or apply a custom network fee.https://apirone.com/docs/fee/#network-fee

comments.author: apirone.com
comments.body: Apirone is one of the few companies that adopted the Taproot protocol for transfers and payment forwarding. Taproot or Bech32m address is the most recent and advanced Bitcoin address format. Taproot introduces more advanced security, privacy, flexibility, and scaling to Bitcoin.
